item.title: Getting started with yii2-advanced-app
item.description: Installation or Setup # Installation Requirements The minimum requirement by this project template is that your Web server supports PHP 5.4.0. Yii2-advanced-app can be installed in two ways. They are Installing via Composer Installing from an Archive File 1) Installing via Composer If you do not already have Composer installed, you may do so by following the instructions at getcomposer.org. On Linux and Mac OS X, you’ll run the following commands:
